How difficult would it be to add pressure-dependent rate coefficients
for g=
as-phase reactions?  I would like to be able to use chemkin
mechanisms with=
 Chebyshev polynomial parameterization or logarithmic
interpolation of pres=
sure and temperature dependence.  
Would adding this functionality be more =
trouble than it's worth?
